name: Dabado Puzzles Demo
description:
Adventure/exploration puzzler, where you explore a mystic island and meet unique characters. To progress, you need to achieve dozens of levels by building constructions from strange blocks, collecting score items, signs, buttons, Light and solve quests.

Dabado Puzzles is hand-painted adventure game with challenging puzzle levels, fun quests, ancient secrets, hidden objects and unique indie atmosphere. Your main goal is to save island Dabado from the cataclysms by revealing the Holy Grail. On the island you will meet interesting personages, build constructions from fantastic blocks, try to reach 1000 scores and reveal all hidden bonuses.

The game is quite non standard and learn the players to be patient. Here some useful tips: https://mazhlekov.com/en/games/dabado_puzzles_tutorial_tips/
